extendedInfo.description: Get help for your Java certification or extend your Java knowledge! This app features:- a reference section with some articles explaining the Java basics and a list including details for 25 commonly used Java classes- customizable tests on Java: more than 250 multiple choice questions, covering all certification topics, spring topics and android development topics- instant feedback after answering a question incorrectly- easy browsing of all questions- history keeping of past tests taken- statistics keeping and fun award attribution when certain goals are met, such as answering a number of questions correctlyIf you want to get ready for Java certification, or extend or test your knowledge about Java, you should give this app a try.In this lite version, ads are displayed. In the full version, there are also 200 more Java questions than in this version and 50 questions on Spring.

reviews.comment: Useless application, it\'s not enough to even beginners, adequate subject not added for beginners. Don\'t download, only waste of time.
reviews.author: Anjani P

reviews.title: it could be awesome
reviews.comment: I got it to work once and its a really cool app, but most of the time the app crashes when I use it. I would definitely but the full version if I knew it was going to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great tool to practice your Java knowledge
reviews.author: A Google User
